overview: Katya has big problems with money. Her old acquaintance calls her and offers to earn easy money in a lottery scam, and share them with each other. Hesitating, Katya agrees. But after winning a lot of money in the lottery, she learns that the person who called her is not who she claims to be. With her boyfriend Denis, she decides not to share with a stranger, but to take all the winnings and run away. Suddenly, for her, everything turns into a struggle for her own life.
title: Ringing
